article_title: The best photobombs and selfies of the Oscars
article_text:
Topics: benedict cumberbatch, ellen degeneres, Oscars 2014, photobomb, selfies, U2, Entertainment News

While paper ballots aren’t yet a thing of the past, Oscars host Ellen DeGegeneres showed America that the Awards ceremony “gets” technology — or at least, it gets #selfies.

Here’s the best, star-studded selfie of the night:

If only Bradley's arm was longer. Best photo ever. #oscars pic.twitter.com/C9U5NOtGap — Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) March 3, 2014

Here’s what the full shot would have looked like:

Selfie x 1000 pic.twitter.com/u542lghMqn — Mike Hayes (@michaelhayes) March 3, 2014

article_metadata.description: Some of the night's best moments came off better in a still shot than in a video
